product_name: Nite Ize Sport Belt Safety Light - Red LED
long_description: With its bright red LED, the streamlined and lightweight Nite Ize Sport Belt Safety Light is the perfect bulk-free, all-weather, all-season way to be visible when you're out in the dark.
short_description: With its bright red LED, the streamlined and lightweight Nite Ize Sport Belt Safety Light is the perfect bulk-free, all-weather, all-season way to be visible when you're out in the dark.
